EmailTemplate.subject: Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Working with Legacy IT
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Week of November 9, 2015 <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15> Cloud Native Webinar Gartner is predicting that by 2020, 75% of applications used to support digital businesses will be built in-house. If you’re one of these companies, you’ll need to quickly evaluate how you develop and run your custom written software. Register now <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15> to join us on Tuesday, December 1 for Part 2 of our series: Ensuring Cloud Native Success: Working with Legacy IT to learn how to put proper portfolio management in place, manage your resources between new and old, find legacy code bases that are favorable to modernizing, and adapt your governance process. READ MORE <http://pivotal.io/platform/webinar/ensuring-cloud-native-success-working-with-legacy-it?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15> PIVOTAL CLOUD FOUNDRY Enterprise-Grade Single Sign-On For Pivotal Cloud Foundry Applications November 05, 2015
We are pleased to announce the general availability of the Pivotal Single Sign-On service for Pivotal Cloud Foundry. This service allows applications running on Pivotal Cloud Foundry to integrate with enterprise identity providers for authentication and SSO with extraordinary simplicity. Read More <https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/enterprise-grade-single-sign-on-for-pivotal-cloud-foundry-applications?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15> Lean Startup Conference 2015 November 16 - 19, 2015 Over 2,000 diverse thinkers and Lean Startup practitioners from around the world will share ideas that are shaping the future of business at the 6th Annual Lean Startup Conference. A gathering for entrepreneurs, corporate innovators, and thought leaders from across sectors and structures, The Lean Startup Conference is a fast paced, highly curated program featuring the best of the Lean Startup community in San Francisco. Register Now <http://leanstartup.co/conferences/lean-startup-conference-2015/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15> Big Data Now Open: Pivotal Big Data Center Of Excellence In Denver November 09, 2015
Pivotal is expanding our partner support. With data and analytics becoming a key differentiator for successful businesses, enterprises and start-ups alike are increasingly building scale-out big data platforms. Pivotal is expanding our presence in Denver to increase the amount of hardware platforms we are certified with, helping to reduce risk and increase the time to value for our customers. Read more about this new capability and how to participate. Also, did we mention that we are hiring in Denver? Read More <https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/now-open-pivotal-big-data-center-of-excellence-in-denver?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=pov-newsletter-11-9-15>
